question: A process is thrashing if ____________
options: ['a) it spends a lot of time executing, rather than paging', 'b) it spends a lot of time paging than executing', 'c) it has no memory allocated to it', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) it spends a lot of time executing, rather than paging
option2: b) it spends a lot of time paging than executing
option3: c) it has no memory allocated to it

question: Thrashing _______ the CPU utilization
options: ['a) increases', 'b) keeps constant', 'c) decreases', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: What is a locality?
options: ['a) a set of pages that are actively used together', 'b) a space in memory', 'c) an area near a set of processes', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) a set of pages that are actively used together
option3: c) an area near a set of processes

question: When a subroutine is called ____________
options: ['a) it defines a new locality', 'b) it is in the same locality from where it was called', 'c) it does not define a new locality', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) it defines a new locality
option2: b) it is in the same locality from where it was called
option3: c) it does not define a new locality

question: A program is generally composed of several different localities, which _____ overlap
options: ['a) may', 'b) must', 'c) do not', 'd) must not']

question: In the working set model, for:
option2: if DELTA = 10, then the working set at time t1 (….7 5 1) is?

question: The accuracy of the working set depends on the selection of ____________
options: ['a) working set model', 'b) working set size', 'c) memory size', 'd) number of pages in memory']
option4: d) number of pages in memory

question: If working set window is too small ____________
options: ['a) it will not encompass entire locality', 'b) it may overlap several localities', 'c) it will cause memory problems', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) it will not encompass entire locality
option2: b) it may overlap several localities
option3: c) it will cause memory problems

question: If working set window is too large ____________
options: ['a) it will not encompass entire locality', 'b) it may overlap several localities', 'c) it will cause memory problems', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) it will not encompass entire locality
option2: b) it may overlap several localities
option3: c) it will cause memory problems

question: If the sum of the working – set sizes increases, exceeding the total number of available frames ____________
options: ['a) then the process crashes', 'b) the memory overflows', 'c) the system crashes', 'd) the operating system selects a process to suspend']
option4: d) the operating system selects a process to suspend
